=====================
Bare i sentence joiner
=====================

mi klama
i do citka
---
(source_file
  (statement (sumti (mi)) (selbri (tanru_unit (word))))
  (i_statement
    (i_prefix (i))
    (statement (sumti (word)) (selbri (tanru_unit (word))))))

=====================
i bo sentence glue
=====================

mi klama
i bo do citka
---
(source_file
  (statement (sumti (mi)) (selbri (tanru_unit (word))))
  (i_statement
    (i_prefix (i_bo))
    (statement (sumti (word)) (selbri (tanru_unit (word))))))

=====================
i je connective between sentences
=====================

mi klama
i je do citka
---
(source_file
  (statement (sumti (mi)) (selbri (tanru_unit (word))))
  (i_statement
    (i_prefix (i_jek))
    (statement (sumti (word)) (selbri (tanru_unit (word))))))

=====================
i joi connective between sentences
=====================

mi klama
i joi do citka
---
(source_file
  (statement (sumti (mi)) (selbri (tanru_unit (word))))
  (i_statement
    (i_prefix (i_joi))
    (statement (sumti (word)) (selbri (tanru_unit (word))))))
